content.rendered:
[vc_row disable_element=”yes” row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657178142623{padding-top: 110px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

Innovative. Modern. Creative.

Food Concept

From High Society-inspired dining to modern Mediterranean chic and serving simply the best Štrukli in town, the award-winning collection of restaurants at the Esplanade Zagreb Hotel lead the pack. Whether you choose grand style or buzzy, al fresco dining, prepare for an unforgettable experience.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
Stylish & Elegant

Zinfandel's Restaurant

Unique environment created at the Zinfandel's and sublime cuisine that combines excellent local ingredients with tastes from all over the world are the winning combination for superb dining experience in the heart of Zagreb.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
A Trendy Edition of Seductive French Cuisine

Le Bistro

Since its opening in 1986, Le Bistro immediately assumed an important role in the city's daily life and has for decades offered typical bistro-style meals, as well as the world-famous Esplanade Štrukli.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
Sip a cocktail and soak up the atmosphere

Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar

Esplanade Zagreb's art deco bar is the destination for afternoon tea as well as an ever-popular Chill Out Nights featuring contemporary music from our resident DJ

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
Feeling like a bite to eat, but too tired to go out for a snack?

Room Service

Just relax, forget about your daily routine, pamper yourself and simply surrender to moments of sheer indulgence.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
Talented and Innovative

Ana Grgić Executive Chef

In 2012 Ana proudly became the very first woman to lead the Esplanade’s kitchen and went on to follow the tradition of crafting exceptional cuisine, placing her specific culinary touch within all her dishes.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”] Find out More
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1579706454951{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1652774462619{background-image: url(https://esplanade.hr/hr/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/topline1.jpg?id=9005) !important;}”]
NAGRAĐIVAN. INOVATIVAN. TRADICIONALAN. KREATIVAN. ODRŽIV.

Food koncept

[vc_column_text]

Od objedovanja nadahnutog visokim društvom do suvremenog mediteranskog bogatstva okusa i posluživanja jednostavno najboljih štrukli u gradu, nagrađivani restorani hotela Esplanade Zagreb naprosto su predvodnici u svojoj klasi. Bilo da odaberete profinjenu eleganciju restorana Zinfandel’s ili živopisni Le Bistro francuskog štiha, pripremite se na vrhunsko i nezaboravno iskustvo objedovanja.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657091196022{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

2022 Chef of the Year

Ana Grgić Tomić, Executive Chef

[vc_column_text]

Iskusna, iznimno talentirana i šarmantna Ana je 2012. godine postala prva žena na čelu Esplanadine kuhinje i nastavila slijediti tradiciju vrhunske gastronomije, uz specifičan potpis koji daje jelima.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] OTKRIJTE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657090960561{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657090970223{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]
Otmjen i elegantan

Zinfandel’s restoran

[vc_column_text]

Njegovo jedinstveno ozračje te kuhinja koja kombinira vrhunske domaće namirnice i okuse iz cijelog svijeta jamstvo su gastronomskog užitka u samom srcu Zagreba.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] OTKRIJTE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657090960561{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657090970223{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]
Zavodljiva francuska kuhinja u trendi izdanju

Le Bistro

[vc_column_text]

Otkako je otvoren, 1986., Le Bistro je odmah zauzeo važno mjesto u dnevnom životu grada i već desetljećima nudi tipična bistro-jela, kao i svjetski poznate Esplanade štrukle.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] OTKRIJTE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657091196022{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]
Kozmopolitski ugođaj u centru Zagreba

Esplanade 1925 Lounge & Cocktail Bar

[vc_column_text]

Jedinstveno ozračje inspirirano 20-im godinama prošlog stoljeća te raznolika ponuda pića i ukusnih zalogaja, kao i idealan spoj tradicije i svega onog modernog što očekujete od jednog bara naći ćete ovdje.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] OTKRIJTE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1661243952610{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]
Pojeli biste nešto, ali ste preumorni za izlazak iz sobe?

Sobna Posluga

[vc_column_text]

Opustite se. Zaboravite svakodnevicu, učinite nešto za sebe i predajte se trenucima potpunog uživanja.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] OTKRIJTE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1654592161275{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″]

Dopustite šarmantnoj chefici Ani Grgić Tomić da vas upozna sa svojim jedinstvenim pogledom na lokalnu kuhinju.

Francuski bistro oduševit će vas svojom jednostavnošću, trendi ponudom i živopisnim okružjem s daškom uličnog teatra.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
